name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-reusable-childflow-array-operations
title: Reusable Child flow for Array Operations
shortDescription: This sample is a reusable cloud flow that can be used for performing Union (All), Intersection (Common) & Difference (Array1-Array2) operation on input JSON arrays.
longDescription: This sample is a reusable cloud flow that can be used for performing Union (All), Intersection (Common) & Difference (Array1-Array2) operation on input JSON arrays.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
